bio.short: I’m a front-end developer and designer based in Fort Worth, TX with a passion for web technologies, inclusivity, and Texas BBQ. I currently help make the space that comes from The Container Store.

experience.title: Design Tools React Developer
experience.description:
I work with UX to build performant, accessible UI, as well as develop solutions to novel front-end challenge, and audit and utilize an array of front-end development tools and techniques.

• I rebuilt our e-commerce site's header and footer.
• I retooled our front-end workflow to support modern JavaScript.
• I built React support into our Java development environment, marrying Spring and Create React App.
• I replaced our outdated CSS workflow with a Sass-based, utility-first approach.
• I facilitate our JavaScript Special Interest Group, a group of developers that help dictate best practices for JS at The Container Store.
• I am also a champion for accessibility.

experience.title: Design Tools React Developer
experience.description:
I worked with a small group of talented developers to create the next generation of customer-facing design tools, using React to create both browser and Electron-based applications for desktop and mobile environments.

• I developed a custom drag-and-drop solution to support both touchscreen and mouse interaction.
• I led a team that increased performance of our Door and Wall Rack tool using Redux.

experience.title: E-commerce Applications Associate
experience.description:
I collaborated with team members on our Java-based e-commerce application and supporting systems.

• I worked on the redesign of our Elfa system marketing pages.
• I participated in our monthly Hackathon challenge and was on three consecutive winning teams.

experience.title: Freelance Front-End Developer and Web Designer
experience.description:
My most recent freelance project was a website redesign for Olive — The Beauty Lounge, an upscale salon based in Mansfield, TX.

• Build and maintain custom WordPress themes
• Interview the client, discuss business needs, establish goals, and carry out solutions
• Google Maps and social media integration

experience.title: Senior Designer
experience.description:
Inprov is a donor development agency based in North Texas that works with non-profit and charitable organizations.

• I work with organizations to produce promotional materials with tight budgets and deadlines to create opportunities for high return on investment.
• One of the challenges I face every day is creating new and interesting ways to present the same message in a recurring format.
• When our company rebranded I jumped at the opportunity to build the new company website.
• I have also developed one-off promotional web pages for clients involving custom web forms and PHP/JavaScript development.
